issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. Phone > play movie > embedded video
2. back out and listen, look for close event alert

results: audio continues, no close event alert is seen
fields.summary: ipad1 only - embedded video audio continues to play after the window is closed
fields.environment: [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/12/11 14:06 e6afca8...), ipad only

comments.body: Removing tbs-1.7.2 label. Not valid since it's a dup.
